{!CampaignMember.Lead},
Thank you for your interest in the {!CampaignMember.Campaign_Program_Name__c} Toolkit. We will contact you when the application system is live â€“ we anticipate early July.

The {!CampaignMember.Campaign_Program_Name__c} Toolkit Team International Trade Administration U.S. Department of Commerce
